Registry of Open Data on AWS

Usage examples for all datasets listed in the Registry of Open Data on AWS tagged with air quality.

OpenAQ

Tutorials
  • Access OpenAQ data via a filterable SNS topic by OpenAQ
  • Analyze Global Air Pollution Using Apache Spark & BigQuery by Kapil Sreedharan
  • Using Athena to access the whole archive by OpenAQ
Tools & Applications
  • ARISense by Aerodyne Research, Inc.
  • hackAIR by hackAir
  • OpenAQ Aggregator by Kapil Sreedharan
  • ropenaq R package by Maëlle Salmon
  • Smokey: Air Quality Bot by Amrit Sharma
Publications
  • Enabling rapid COVID-19 and air pollution analysis across the globe with OpenAQ and AWS by Christa Hasenkopf

Ozone Monitoring Instrument (OMI) / Aura NO2 Tropospheric Column Density

Tutorials
  • Medium Post: COG Talk — Part 1: What’s new? by Vincent Sarago
Tools & Applications
  • COG Application Programming Interface (API) by Development Seed
  • COG metadata example  by Development Seed
  • COG Viewer by Development Seed
  • Rasterio (Python Library) for access to geospatial raster data by Mapbox

GEOS-Chem Input Data

Tutorials
  • Tutorial on accessing GEOS-Chem data bucket in S3 by Jiawei Zhuang
Publications
  • Enabling Immediate Access to Earth Science Models through Cloud Computing: Application to the GEOS-Chem Model by Jiawei Zhuang, et al.
  • Overview of the GEOSChem-on-cloud project by Atmospheric Chemistry Modeling Group, Harvard University
  • Running GEOS-Chem on Cloud Computing Platforms, presented at the 8th International GEOS-Chem Meeting by Jiawei Zhuang, et al.

Tutorials

Tools & Applications
  • Catalogue of data set by Meteorological Envionmental Earth Observation

Publications

Tutorials

Safecast

Tools & Applications
  • Safecast Map by Nick Dolezal

If you want to add a dataset or usage example to this registry, please follow the instructions on the Registry of Open Data on AWS GitHub repository.
